title: Silicon Flatirons Entrepreneurship Initiative Fund
description: To provide programmatic support for the Silicon Flatirons Entrepreneurship Initiative that includes activities to build bridges and consensus between University groups and private groups at the School of Law at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide programmatic support for the Silicon Flatirons Entrepreneurship Initiative that includes activities to build bridges and consensus between University groups and private groups at the School of Law at the University of Colorado Boulder.
